metadata.title: CVE-2021-33098 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Improper input validation in the Intel(R) Ethernet ixgbe driver for Linuxbefore version 3.17.3 may allow an authenticated user to potentially enabledenial of service via local access.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').

linux-fips package in fips/xenial is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication.
